question:
Consider the following statements about the archaeological site Mahasthangarh:
  1. It is an urban archaeological site discovered in Bangladesh
  2. It has been declared as the cultural capital of South Asian Association of Regional Cooperation (SAARC) for the year 2016-17
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
Mahasthangarh, the 3rd century BC archaeological site in Bogra, Bangladesh, has been declared as the South Asian Association of Regional Cooperation (SAARC) cultural capital for the year 2016-17. It was the ancient capital of Pundravardhana i.e. home of the Pundra, a group of people not speaking languages of the Indo-European family.
